chat.empty: Chat is empty. Start a conversation to see content here.

titleGeneration.aiPrompt: Based on this conversation exchange, generate a concise, descriptive title (maximum 3-4 words, 30 characters):
titleGeneration.instructions: Generate a title that captures the main topic or intent. Only respond with the title, nothing else.

files.formatFailed: Failed to format document after task operation

errors.helpPrompt:
I got an error while using {{mode}} mode:
```{{error}}```
Can you help me?

tasks.insertOutOfBounds: Cannot insert task at index {{index}}: Index out of bounds (document has {{total}} items)
tasks.multipleFound: Multiple tasks found with description "{{task}}" in {{path}}. Please make your task description more specific.
tasks.notFound: To-do item "{{task}}" not found in {{path}}. If the task is in another file, please specify it in the file_path parameter.

messages.newVersionFoundDownloading: New version {{latestVersion}} found! Downloading update from {{currentVersion}}...
messages.pluginUpToDate: Life Navigator is up to date (version {{version}})
messages.updateAvailable: Update available! Version {{latestVersion}} is now available (you have {{currentVersion}})

lifeNavigator.title: Guide
lifeNavigator.voiceInstructions: Speak in a helpful, conversational tone. Keep responses concise but thorough. When recommending content, briefly explain why it's a good fit. Ask follow-up questions to better understand user needs.

checkUpdates.desc: Check if there's a newer version of Life Navigator available and download it automatically.
checkUpdates.name: Check for Updates

resetTutorial.desc: Reset the setup tutorial and onboarding flow. This will show the setup screens again next time you open Life Navigator.
resetTutorial.name: Reset Tutorial

prompts.defaultPrompt:
# Domain
A message or voice command issued by the user to the AI assistant.

# Glossary
`🧭 current_file_and_selection()`
`🧭 current_chat()`

Start of transcription:
prompts.speechToTextPromptDesc: The prompt that will be sent to the speech-to-text engine. This provides context to the AI model. You can use link expansion.

secrets.description: Manage API keys and secrets for user-defined tools. These are stored as key-value pairs for flexible use.

errors.keyExists: Secret '{{key}}' already exists. Do you want to overwrite it?

dialog.valuePlaceholder: Enter the API key or secret value

list.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete the secret '{{key}}'?
list.noSecrets: No secrets configured. Add API keys and secrets using the button above.

secrets.securityNote: Important: Your secrets are encrypted using AES-256 and stored in your Obsidian config folder. While this provides protection against casual inspection, anyone with access to the plugin source code can potentially decrypt them. Do not share your vault or config folder with others if you store sensitive API keys here.
secrets.title: API Keys & Secrets

list.noManager: User tools manager not initialized. Try restarting Obsidian.
list.noTools: No user-defined tools found. Use Tool Creator mode to create custom tools through chat.

tooltips.clickToOpen: Click to open tool file in editor

security.title: Security Notice
security.warning: User-defined tools execute JavaScript code with full access to your vault, file system, and network requests. Each tool requires individual approval before execution. Always review tool code carefully before approving, and only approve tools from trusted sources.

security.description: This tool will execute JavaScript code that can access your vault, file system, and make network requests.
security.title: Security Warning
security.warning: Only approve tools from trusted sources. Always review the code carefully before approval.

progress.empty: No conversation to save - the current conversation is empty
progress.fileExists: File already exists at {{path}}. Set auto_version to true to create a versioned file
progress.success: Successfully saved conversation with {{count}} messages to: {{path}}

progress.versionedPath: File already exists. Creating versioned file: {{originalPath}} → {{versionedPath}}

currentDateTime.failed: Failed to get current date and time
currentDateTime.label: Getting current date and time ...

currentFileAndSelection.completed: Retrieved current file and selection context
currentFileAndSelection.failed: Failed to get current file and selection
currentFileAndSelection.label: Getting current file and selection ...

dailyNotes.failed: Failed to get daily notes ({{start}} to {{end}})
dailyNotes.label: Getting daily notes range ...

findFilesByTag.failed: Failed to find files with tag {{tag}}
findFilesByTag.label: Find Files by Tag

handover.completedFull: You are now in {{mode}} mode. Perform a given task, immediately after you are done, switch back to "{{fromMode}}" using the handover_mode tool.
handover.label: Handing over control ...

errors.confirmationRequired: Deletion must be explicitly confirmed with confirm_deletion: true

progress.noSecrets: No secrets are currently configured. Use the secret_save tool to add API keys and other secrets.
progress.securityNote: 🔒 Security Note: Secret values are hidden for security. Only names are shown above.

progress.securityReminder: ⚠️ Security Notice: Secrets are encrypted using AES-256 and stored in your Obsidian config folder. While this provides protection against casual inspection, anyone with access to the plugin source code can potentially decrypt them.

modal.reloadRequiredMessageWithVersions:
Plugin updated from version {{currentVersion}} to {{latestVersion}}.
Would you like to restart Obsidian to apply changes?
modal.systemPromptErrorMessage: Cannot display system prompt: {{error}}. Check your mode file and ensure all linked files exist, or remove the 🧭 emoji from links that should not be expanded.

anthropicKey.description: Anthropic Claude powers the main AI functionality. You'll need an API key to continue.
anthropicKey.placeholder: Paste your Anthropic API key here
anthropicKey.title: Configure Anthropic API Key

language.description: Choose your preferred language. Life Navigator will work best when your language matches how you write your notes.
language.manualRestart: Please restart Obsidian to apply the language changes.
language.note: If you change languages, Obsidian will restart automatically to apply the changes.
language.title: Configure Language

openaiKey.description: OpenAI powers voice features like text-to-speech. This is optional but recommended.
openaiKey.placeholder: Paste your OpenAI API key here
openaiKey.title: Configure OpenAI API Key

reasons.quotaExceeded: API quota exceeded, but key is valid

description.few: Multiple modes have validation issues that need to be resolved.
description.many: Multiple modes have validation issues that need to be resolved.
description.singular: A mode has validation issues that need to be resolved.

message.few: Help me fix validation issues with mode files: {{filePaths}}. These modes have validation errors that need to be resolved.
message.many: Help me fix validation issues with mode files: {{filePaths}}. These modes have validation errors that need to be resolved.
message.singular: Help me fix validation issues with a mode file "{{filePaths}}". This mode has validation errors that need to be resolved.

fixSpecificMode.description: The current mode "{{modeName}}" has validation issues that need to be resolved.
fixSpecificMode.message: Help me fix validation issues with the mode file "{{filePath}}". This mode file has validation errors that need to be resolved.

description.few: Multiple tools have validation issues that need to be resolved.
description.many: Multiple tools have validation issues that need to be resolved.
description.singular: A tool has validation issues that need to be resolved.

message.few: Help me fix validation issues with tool files: {{filePaths}}. These tools have validation errors that need to be resolved.
message.many: Help me fix validation issues with tool files: {{filePaths}}. These tools have validation errors that need to be resolved.
message.singular: Help me fix validation issues with a tool file "{{filePaths}}". This tool has validation errors that need to be resolved.

helpButton.tooltip: Switch to Guide mode and get help fixing validation issues
